post.author: Brendan

comment.author: 박경종
comment.content: We're working on it. Thank you.

comment.author: 김형태
comment.content: Please check SMTP Relay Status & Authethication on the SMTP Server. And report to q-surf.com again.

comment.author: 박경종
comment.content: Our web team resolved it. Does anyone still have problem ?

post.content:
The recent email that I've got was judged as a spam, so I couldn't read what's inside. You should find out a solution to avoid this. Here is the content generated by Hotmail.

------------------

Spam detection software, running on the system "q-surf.com", has
identified this incoming email as possible spam.  The original message
has been attached to this so you can view it (if it isn't spam) or block
similar future email.  If you have any questions, see
postmaster@qwebsites.com for details.

Content preview:  COSKA Newsletter - 2004 Á¤±â ÃÑÈ¸ °á°ú º¸°í & 2004
  COSKA ±³À° ÀÚ¿ø ºÀ»ç ¸ðÁý URI:http://www.coska.com COSKA Home
  URI:http://www.coska.com/newsletter/img/logo.gif
  URI:http://www.coska.com/newsletter/img/top_bg.gif
  URI:http://www.coska.com/newsletter/img/top_bg.gif COSKA NEWSLETTER
  2004 Mar Vol. 3 COSKA Annual Meeting Report COSKA Education Volunteer
  [...]

Content analysis details:   (6.5 points, 6.0 required)

pts rule name              description
---- ---------------------- --------------------------------------------------
0.5 X_PRIORITY_HIGH        Sent with 'X-Priority' set to high
0.1 HTML_FONTCOLOR_RED     BODY: HTML font color is red
0.8 HTML_COMMENT_8BITS     BODY: HTML comment has 3 consecutive 8-bit chars
0.1 HTML_FONTCOLOR_UNKNOWN BODY: HTML font color is unknown to us
0.2 HTML_50_60             BODY: Message is 50% to 60% HTML
0.1 MIME_HTML_ONLY         BODY: Message only has text/html MIME parts
0.0 HTML_MESSAGE           BODY: HTML included in message
0.1 HTML_FONTCOLOR_UNSAFE  BODY: HTML font color not in safe 6x6x6 palette
2.7 SUBJ_ILLEGAL_CHARS     Subject contains too many raw illegal characters
1.9 MIME_HEADER_CTYPE_ONLY 'Content-Type' found without required MIME headers

The original message was not completely plain text, and may be unsafe to
open with some email clients; in particular, it may contain a virus,
or confirm that your address can receive spam.  If you wish to view
it, it may be safer to save it to a file and open it with an editor.
post.title: COSKA's email is regarded as a spam by hotmail
